titleStmt.title: Aulus Persius Flaccus his Satires translated into English, by Barten Holyday Mr of Arts, and student of Christ-Church in Oxford
Works. English
titleStmt.author: Persius.
Holyday, Barten, 1593-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes, printer to the Vniversitie,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with Oxford device (McKerrow 336) on title page.
Identified as STC 19778 on UMI microfilm reel 1607.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
